Is there no way to learn more about Verus or get involved with the community?

That's not true. You can start reading the documentation at docs.verus.io, join the Discord to learn and discuss with the community, explore with the community on Discord, follow Verus on Twitter, or visit the official website at verus.io.

serve currency itself can also be used as one of the reserves in another multi-reserve liquidity basket AMM token on Verus.
👀 Stay tuned for more on this later, or start reading docs.verus.io, or join the Discord to learn.
